title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: Four awesome bars from maker Kialara are up for auction!! LOT 1: 2015 Original 1BTC w/ Silver #216/250LOT 2: 2016 Signature Series 'Soul of Satoshi' by Maxfield #204/500LOT 3: 2015 Signature Series 'Excavatorelevator 2' by Ricky Allman #182/250LOT 4: 2017 Silver Series 'To The Moon' #156/250*Each bar will come with custom plastic case made by Kialara and a stand fro displaySTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.016BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 3 decimal places**END TIME: JULY 7th, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
